titleStmt.title: The equall vvayes of God tending to the rectifying of the crooked wayes of man. The passages whereof are briefly and clearly drawne from the sacred Scriptures. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hayne, Thomas, 1582-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop under St Peters Church in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
